structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The board shall have the power to hear and decide on applications for variances. The board may impose any reasonable conditions or restrictions on any variance it decides to grant.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 25, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 97, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 52.
